edgeauth.setup.subscription.description: Access protects internal resources by authenticating against identity providers you already use. With Access, you can control which users and groups can reach sensitive materials without a VPN or making code changes to your site.
edgeauth.subscription.help: Understanding Subscriptions and Billing for Cloudflare Access
edgeauth.setup.subscription.free_promo.t: Configuration for Access has moved to the Cloudflare Zero Trust dashboard as of May 25, 2022. This page has been deprecated. All existing functionality, as well as new features, is available in the Zero Trust dashboard.
